elementalistmod:MagusStaff.NAME: Magus Staff
elementalistmod:MagusStaff.FLAVOR: A mysterious staff the elementalist found on their person upon waking. It feels important somehow...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gains a charge for every 5 cards played. NL Click an elemental orb to convert a charge into one point of that element. NL Starts each battle with 1 charge.

elementalistmod:GraduationLetter.NAME: Graduation Letter
elementalistmod:GraduationLetter.FLAVOR: The end of one journey, and the beginning of another. Perhaps it's time to break the seal and choose your elemental specialization.
DESCRIPTIONS: Click to choose an elemental specialization, losing the graduation letter in the process.

elementalistmod:BlueRibbon.NAME: Blue Ribbon
elementalistmod:BlueRibbon.FLAVOR: A curious and familiar blue ribbon. It looks similar to the one on your staff...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start battles with 1 Water. You are more likely to find Water-based cards.

elementalistmod:RedRibbon.NAME: Red Ribbon
elementalistmod:RedRibbon.FLAVOR: A curious and familiar redribbon. It looks similar to the one on your staff...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start battles with 1 Fire. You are more likely to find Fire-based cards.

elementalistmod:YellowCirclet.NAME: Yellow Circlet
elementalistmod:YellowCirclet.FLAVOR: A curious and familiar yellow circlet. It looks similar to the one on your staff...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start battles with 1 Earth. You are more likely to find Earth-based cards.

elementalistmod:GreenCirclet.NAME: Green Circlet
elementalistmod:GreenCirclet.FLAVOR: A curious and familiar green circlet. It looks similar to the one on your staff...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start battles with 1 Air. You are more likely to find Air-based cards.
